form.LN:
V pisni angleščini
only
ponavadi postavimo tik pred besedo, na katero se nanaša. V govorjeni angleščini pa z naglasom lahko določimo, na kaj se beseda
only
nanaša, zato njeno mesto ni tako pomembno.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
only
pokažemo na stvar, ki edina nastopa ali se zgodi v določenem položaju.

seg.quote: He read only paperbacks.
I'm only interested in facts.
Only Mother knows.
The video is to be used for teaching purposes only.

sense.def:
The only person or thing involved in a particular situation
je oseba ali stvar, ki je ena sama svoje vrste v določenih okoliščinah.

seg.quote: I was the only one smoking.
It was the only way out.

sense.def:
An only child
je otrok, ki nima bratov in sester.

Izraz
only
lahko uporabimo, če želimo poudariti, da je nekaj nepomembno ali premajhno.

seg.quote: It was only a squirrel.
I was only joking.
We only paid £26.

sense.def:
Izraz
only
lahko uporabimo, če želimo poudariti, da se je nekaj zgodilo pred kratkim.

seg.quote: I've only just arrived.

sense.def:
Izraz
only
lahko uporabimo, če želimo poudariti željo ali upanje.

seg.quote: I only wish I had the money.
Snake is just like chicken, only tougher.
‘That's what I'm trying to do,’ said Mrs Oliver, ‘only I can't get near enough.’

sense.def:
Only
lahko uporabimo pred nedoločnikom, kadar uvajamo dogodek, ki se je zgodil neposredno za prejšnjim in je precej presenetljiv ali nezaželen.

seg.quote: He broke off, only to resume almost at once.
I had tried this years before, only to receive a polite refusal.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
only
poudarimo, da se nam določeno ukrepanje ali vedenje v danih okoliščinah zdi smiselno.

seg.quote: It is only natural that she will have mixed feelings about your promotion.

sense.def:
Kadar se bo ena stvar zgodila
only if another thing happens
, se bo zgodila le, če se bo prej zgodila druga.

seg.quote: These snakes only attack if they feel cornered or threatened.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
only just
poudarimo, da nekaj skoraj ni res.

seg.quote: He could only just hear them.
The heat was only just bearable.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
not only
uvedemo prvo izmed dveh povezanih trditev, kadar je druga še presenetljivejša ali skrajnejša kot prva.

seg.quote: Chimpanzees not only use tools but make them.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo
has only to do one thing in order to achieve or prove another
, je dovolj, da naredi nekaj preprostega, da bi dosegel ali dokazal nekaj drugega.

seg.quote: You've only got to read the newspapers to see what can happen to hitch-hikers.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
only too
poudarimo, da se nekaj zgodi v večjem obsegu, kot bi pričakovali ali želeli.

seg.quote: He is only too pleased to help.
She remembered that night only too clearly.
